body.name: Mini Projector, VISSPL Full HD 1080P Video Projector, Portable Outdoor Projector with Tripod, Kids Gift, Home Theater Movie Phone Projector Compatible with Android/iOS/Windows/TV Stick/HDMI/USB

features: ★【Smallest & On-the-Go Entertainment】Measuring a mere 6.1*5.08*2.4’’, equivalent to the size of two Coke cans, mini projector can easily fit in your pocket or bag. Weighing only 1.1 lb, even child's tiny fingers can effortlessly grasp the smallest projector. Its sophisticated design and exquisite handheld packaging makes it a perfect gift choice for all ages. Just enjoy the freedom of taking this lightweight and handy projector with you wherever you go.

★【Full HD 1080P & Eye Protection】The VISSPL 2023 projector supports 1080P resolution for stunning visuals. Powered by advanced LED technology and a uniform illumination method, our projector guarantees exceptional image quality, delivering a dynamic and color-vibrant effect, minimizing the impact of blue and direct light. Perfect for safeguarding children's eye health! For optimal performance, we recommend using video projector in a dark environment to fully enjoy its capabilities.

★【Mini Tripod & Powerful Sound】VISSPL movie projector supports a screen size of 35-160’’, perfect for creating a cinematic atmosphere. ±15°Keystone correction and included projector tripod offers the freedom to position your projector at the ideal height, eliminating the need to adjust to screen or table limitations. With its built-in HiFi speaker to enjoy powerful and dynamic audio that enhances your entertainment experience whether it's at home, or during kids' parties.

★【Multiple-device Connection】VISSPL outdoor projector provides multiple input source interfaces, catering to a wide range of equipment requirements. With HDMI, USB, AV, and Audio ports, it seamlessly connects to devices such as smartphones, laptops, TV stick, PS5, and external speakers. ★Due to HDCP copyright issues, Netflix / Disney / Hulu prohibits playing movies directly from the projector, please use a TV Stick to play.★When connecting with phone, an extra HDMI adapter is needed.★

★【Lifetime Technical Support】VISSPL projector team offers Lifetime Technical Support for all our projectors, ensuring you receive ongoing assistance and guidance whenever needed. If you have any problems while using, please feel free to contact us. VISSPL team offers 2-year product replacement warranty and 100% satisfaction guarantee.

Is the projector compatible with smartphones? Yes, when connecting with phone, an extra HDMI adapter is needed. (HDMI adapter not included) It is not compatible with Google phones. Due to mirroring protocol, Google phones do not support screen mirroring Can I play Netflix, Prime Video, Hulu, etc? Due to HDCP copyright issues, the apps like Netflix / Disney / Hulu prohibits playing movies directly by mirror screen with smartphone. Please use a TV stick to connect to watch it. Can I use it for business presentation? Not recommended for business presentation, it is a home theater projector. We recommend using video projector in a dark environment to fully enjoy its capabilities. What is the optimal viewing distance and projection size of this mini projector? The best viewing distance is 6.56ft (2m) and the size is about 70 inches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This projector has been great, we have really enjoyed using it. Soemtimes we wil point it at the ceiling and watch movies while lying in bed, which has been very fun. It is small and portable which is aso good for traveling and we enjoy the fact that you can plug an amazon Fire stick into it to use as well. The picture quality is is good and we have enjoyed the fact that it does not seem to overheat quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Gift for a College Student!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my son who is going off to college - he does have a TV but decided this may be better for easily bringing up a "TV" and removing it when not in use since the dorm room isn't huge. We tested it out in a small living room and it worked great! Displayed the laptop display just fine although, the audio didn't work but that was user error I'm sure. Just do your homework when setting this up and follow the instructions and you'll have a great time! The clarity is great and everything is legible. It can be used in a small space or a large space but you should at least have clear wall to work with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up. Good quality picture.
reviews.reviewText: Happy with quality. Easy to set up. Only issue is I didn’t realize I needed to buy an adapter to use my phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought a projector from another website that was cheaper and bad quality. This one is as advertised and true 1080p HD quality. I am able to connect my steam deck (needs hdmi / usb c adapter) and it is like having a big screen I can take anywhere. I has a USB port so that you can watch videos / pictures etc. from a USB drive, or with an adapter you can watch from an SD card (a great idea if you want to share family photos and videos on the go). I use it as an extension of my phone and gaming devices so I don't need to take a bulky monitor and a lot of extra cables with me.I wish that there was a dedicated SD Card reader on the device, and the battery compartment for the remote control was difficult to open. Otherwise this is an awesome projector at a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Add to cart and check out today!
reviews.reviewText: Purchased projector to watch sports and movies. Had to purchase a cable to hook it up to phone, Chromebook, or laptop. It is awesome! We purchased a 150 inch screen (you can also use a blank wall) and the picture is great and my family loves it! My son hooked up his PS5 as well. The large picture makes it feel like you are on field at a game or in the movie. Fun experience. We are able to use a separate blue tooth speaker to enhance the sound as well. Good purchase. Will gift more to family and friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Compact & easy to use. Needed help with the initial setup & the tech team was very helpful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good projector
reviews.reviewText: Out of the box the projector is small and quite portable. The tripod is tiny and cute but did not hold the projector when tilted all the way back.Picture quality is pretty good. No complaints there.It does not have wifi so if you want to stream from your phone you will need to connect it with a cable or a chrome cast.The sound is barely loud enough, even when sitting 5 feet away in a mostly quiet house. So external speakers are a must.Overall, it does what it says and I'm pretty happy with this little projector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
